messages.content: Candle Buffet is an Australian candle making company creating a new line of small candles featuring slightly inappropriate messages on them.  Please provide suggestions for the name of this range

1. Cheeky Flames
2. Witty Wicks
3. Bold Burners
4. Sassy Scents
5. Snarky Sparks
6. Naughty Nimbuses
7. Impish Ignitions
8. Playful Pyres
9. Rascal Radiance
10. Banter Blaze
We like NSFWicks, what options could NSF stand for?

1. Not-So-Formal Wicks
2. Never-Seen-Fire Wicks
3. Naughty Scented Flames
4. Nonchalant Sassy Flames
5. Notorious Scented Wonders
6. Nighttime Spicy Fragrances
7. Novelty Silly Flames
8. Nifty Scandalous Fires
9. No-Strings-Fun Wicks
10. Nudge-and-Smirking Flames
